üë®‚Äçüíª About Me

Hi! I‚Äôm Anirban Routh, a passionate developer currently pursuing my Master‚Äôs in Computer Applications (MCA). My journey in tech began with curiosity and evolved into a deep enthusiasm for building interactive, meaningful tools that help others understand complex topics.

Over time, I‚Äôve dived into Data Structures and Algorithms not just as a subject, but as a way to strengthen problem-solving skills and think like a true engineer. This led me to build this DSA Visualizer project ‚Äî a practical demonstration of how I merge logic, UI/UX, and creativity.

What Drives Me:
‚ú¶ Crafting visual and intuitive learning tools
‚ú¶ Solving problems through code
‚ú¶ Exploring front-end technologies like React & Tailwind CSS
‚ú¶ Learning by doing ‚Äî building projects to reinforce concepts

What I‚Äôve Built Here:
From Linked Lists to Trees, Graphs to Min-Heaps ‚Äî each visualizer reflects my understanding of both the theory and implementation of core DSA topics. I‚Äôve added traversal animations, memory layout visuals, and interactive controls to ensure users can engage with data structures the same way I learned ‚Äî by doing.

Goal:
To become a developer who not only codes but explains ‚Äî who not only builds projects but builds experiences. I'm working toward opportunities where I can grow as a full-stack or front-end developer, contribute to open-source, and stay on the cutting edge of the web.

Thanks for stopping by!

); }; export default AboutMe;
